column5: We have an extremely comfortable home with an amazing back yard! Located directly next to large parks, skate park, and five minutes from the beautiful Guadalupe River. If you are interested in relaxing while you are in Kerrville the room has a brand new and comfortable king size bed as well as a television and DVD player. My wife and I are both very active and love the outdoors. Please feel free to use our enormous backyard and our home is open to you.
